properties.displayName: New Root Certificate Installed Via CertMgr.EXE
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where (ProcessCommandLine contains "/add" and ProcessCommandLine contains "root") and (FolderPath endswith "\\CertMgr.exe" or ProcessVersionInfoOriginalFileName =~ "CERTMGT.EXE")

tags.name: description
tags.value:
Detects execution of "certmgr" with the "add" flag in order to install a new certificate on the system.
Adversaries may install a root certificate on a compromised system to avoid warnings when connecting to adversary controlled web servers.
